attributes.action: Make prescriptions free of charge in England.
attributes.additional_details: To make us more in line with the rest of the UK, and also to make health care and medication free for everyone.
attributes.background: Have a debate and make prescriptions free for everyone in England, currently working people pay for their prescriptions in England.

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592147
